definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: and macromolecular clumps of organic material called kerogen.
sentences.chinese: 最後是一種叫做油母質的大分子化合物。

sentences.english: It is the polymerization of units linked end-to-end that forms the characteristic chains of macromolecules.
sentences.chinese: 這些單位的首尾聚合，形成大分子的特有連鎖。

sentences.english: The dynamics of excitable systems and biomacromolecules have been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了可激系統和生物大分子中的動力學行爲。

sentences.english: But for primitive macromolecules to easily split apart for replication requires temperatures near boiling!
sentences.chinese: 但是對於原始大分子卻是在沸點附近容易複製。

sentences.english: Large molecules resulting from the simultaneous polymerisation of two or more monomer units.
sentences.chinese: 兩個或更多單體同時聚合而形成的大分子。

sentences.english: Coal is a kind of mixture which is mainly constituted by cross-linked network macromolecule.
sentences.chinese: 煤是一種主要由有機網狀大分子組成的混合物。

sentences.english: In this manner, the target macromolecules and colloids are counted.
sentences.chinese: 在這種方式下，目標大分子和膠體計算在內。

sentences.english: The TGA result indicated that the fibre macromolecules were not degraded by carrier BIP.
sentences.chinese: 熱重分析表明，載體BIP未引起纖維大分子的降解。

sentences.english: Biological materials move in and out through the pores.
sentences.chinese: 各種生物大分子通過核孔進出。

sentences.english: Lubricating oil comes from heavier molecules with 20 to 50 carbons.
sentences.chinese: 潤滑油由20到50個碳的大分子組成。

sentences.english: This paper synthesized a kind of macromolecule retinyl schiff base salts.
sentences.chinese: 合成了一種大分子視黃基席夫鹼鹽微波吸收劑。

sentences.english: The mechanisms of intercellular trafficking of macromolecules via plasmodesmata are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文對大分子通過胞間連絲轉移的機理進行了討論。

sentences.english: CHARMM is a program for macromolecular dynamics and mechanics.
sentences.chinese: CHARMM是大分子動力學和力學的程序。

sentences.english: A large molecule have been brought using a optical tweezer which can move as measurement requirement.
sentences.chinese: 光鑷子能鑷住大分子，按照測量要求進行操作。

sentences.english: The dendrimers of amino as end group have no visbreaking effect on the crude oil.
sentences.chinese: 端基爲氮基的樹狀大分子對原油不具有降黏效果。

sentences.english: The neutral mutation is only a part of the macromolecule.
sentences.chinese: 木村資生的中性學說反映了生物大分子的部分規律。

definition: polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
